character_aatrox_opposingtips:
• Aatrox's attacks are very telegraphed, so use the time to dodge the hit zones.
  • Aatrox's Infernal Chains are easier to exit when running towards the sides or at Aatrox.
  • Keep your distance when Aatrox uses his Ultimate to prevent him from reviving.
character_aatrox_tips:
• Use Umbral Dash while casting The Darkin Blade to increase your chances of hitting the enemy.
  • Crowd Control abilities like Infernal Chains or your allies' immobilizing effects will help you set up The Darkin Blade.
  • Cast World Ender when you are sure you can force a fight.
generatedtip_passive_aatroxpassive_descr: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> and heals him, based on the target's max health.
kaylevsaatrox_aatroxobjective: Kill <keywordMajor>Kayle</keywordMajor> or <keywordMajor>Morgana</keywordMajor> twice before they can do the same to <keywordMajor>Aatrox</keywordMajor>.
kaylevsaatrox_kayleobjective: Take down <keywordMajor>Aatrox</keywordMajor> twice before he can do the same to <keywordMajor>Kayle</keywordMajor>. An ally <keywordMajor>Morgana</keywordMajor> can aid her, but if <keywordMajor>Aatrox</keywordMajor> kills <keywordMajor>Morgana</keywordMajor>, he'll creep closer to victory.
kaylevsaatrox_morganaobjective: Between <keywordMajor>Morgana</keywordMajor> and <keywordMajor>Kayle</keywordMajor>, take down <keywordMajor>Aatrox</keywordMajor> twice before he can take down the sisters twice, himself.
passive_aatroxpassive_description: Aatrox deals bonus damage on his next attack, healing for the damage dealt.
passive_aatroxpassive_lore: Once honored defenders of Shurima against the Void, Aatrox and his brethren would eventually become an even greater threat to Runeterra, and were defeated only by cunning mortal sorcery. But after centuries of imprisonment, Aatrox was the first to find freedom once more, corrupting and transforming those foolish enough to try and wield the magical weapon that contained his essence. Now, with stolen flesh, he walks Runeterra in a brutal approximation of his previous form, seeking an apocalyptic and long overdue vengeance.
quests_kaylevsaatrox_morganalosstootlip:
Aatrox has triumphed and is now one step closer to bringing about total destruction.

Kayle: “We've failed them all...”
Morgana: “Together...”
game_message_ahriannouncerenabled: <font color='#42f4f1'>The Star Guardian Ahri announcer is enabled!</font>
generatedtip_passive_ahripassive_descrip:
After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals.
After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.
generatedtip_passive_akalip_description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.
generatedtip_passive_akalipweapon_descri: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.
generatedtip_passive_akalipzoneground_de: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.
generatedtip_passive_akshanpassive_descr:
Every three hits from Akshan's Attacks and Abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion.

When Akshan Attacks, he fires an additional Attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional Attack, he instead gains Move Speed.
generatedtip_passive_alistarpassive_desc: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.
generatedtip_passive_ambessapassive_desc: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.
generatedtip_passive_amumup_description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_anniepassive_descri:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.
generatedtip_passive_apheliosp_descripti: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.
generatedtip_passive_ashepassive_descrip:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
generatedtip_passive_aurelionsolpassive_: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of <font color='#3458eb'>Stardust</font>, which permanently improves each of his abilities.
quests_smoldervsaurelionsol_aurelionsoli: <flavorText>“I'm a cosmic dragon, not your little playmate. I suppose it's time I teach you the difference.”</flavorText> <keywordMajor>Aurelion Sol</keywordMajor> aims to show <keywordMajor>Smolder</keywordMajor> that he's no mere terrestrial dragon! Each stack earned by either <keywordMajor>Smolder</keywordMajor> or <keywordMajor>Aurelion Sol</keywordMajor> increases the size of the reward. Earn the reward by killing or assisting a kill on <keywordMajor>Smolder</keywordMajor> before he gets you.
quests_smoldervsaurelionsol_smolderinstr: <flavorText>“Ready or not, here I come!”</flavorText> <keywordMajor>Smolder</keywordMajor> has challenged his new friend <keywordMajor>Aurelion Sol</keywordMajor> to a game. Each stack earned by either <keywordMajor>Smolder</keywordMajor> or <keywordMajor>Aurelion Sol</keywordMajor> increases the size of the reward. Earn the reward by killing or assisting a kill on <keywordMajor>Aurelion Sol</keywordMajor> before he gets you.
smoldervsaurelionsolaurelionsoldescripti:
Earn a cash out of stacks by taking down Smolder.

AurelionSol Contribution: @f1@
Smolder Contribution: @f2@
Reward: @f3@

(Reward Calculation: Combined stacks / 4 with a min-max of 15-60)
smoldervsaurelionsolaurelionsollosstt: “Well… we were simply playing a game. It's good to make the little ones feel powerful. Inspiring the youth, and whatnot.” Aurelion Sol was bested by a hatchling. Smolder collects the stacks reward.
smoldervsaurelionsolaurelionsolrewardtt:
“Take notes, hatchling.” Aurelion Sol has taught young Smolder an important lesson and earned himself a cash out of stacks.

Gain all the stacks Smolder and you banked during the quest for a total of @f3@ stacks.

AurelionSol Contribution: @f1@
Smolder Contribution: @f2@
smoldervsaurelionsolsmolderdescriptiontt:
Earn a cash out of stacks by taking down Aurelion Sol.

Smolder Contribution: @f2@
AurelionSol Contribution: @f1@
Reward: @f3@

(Reward Calculation: Combined stacks / 4 with a min-max of 15-60)
smoldervsaurelionsolsmolderlosstt: “(scolding mom roar) But Moomm… I'm already practicing e-ver-y day!” Smolder still has much to learn. Aurelion Sol collects the stacks reward.
smoldervsaurelionsolsmolderrewardtt:
“Didja see that, Mom??? I beat that Hairy-Iron-Soil guy!!!” Smolder has beaten Aurelion Sol, earning him a cash out of stacks.

Gain all the stacks Aurelion Sol and you banked during the quest for a total of @f3@ stacks.

Smolder Contribution: @f2@
AurelionSol Contribution: @f1@
generatedtip_passive_aurorapassive_descr: Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around and heal her.
generatedtip_passive_azirpassive_descrip: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
generatedtip_passive_belvethpassive_desc: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.
generatedtip_passive_brandpassive_descri: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.
generatedtip_passive_braumpassive_descri:
Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.
generatedtip_passive_briarp_description: Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing Health, but lacks innate Health Regeneration.
generatedtip_passive_caitlynpassive_desc: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
quests_jinxvscaitlyn_instructionscait: Catch Jinx in Caitlyn's <spellName>Yordle Snap Trap</spellname> and slay her within 5 seconds.
quests_jinxvscaitlyn_instructionsjinx: Catch Caitlyn in one of Jinx's <spellName>Flame Chompers!</spellName> and slay her within 5 seconds.
generatedtip_passive_camillepassive_desc: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.
generatedtip_passive_cassiopeiapassive_d: Cassiopeia gains Move Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.
generatedtip_passive_dariushemomarker_de: Darius' attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Darius enrages and gains massive Attack Damage when his target reaches max stacks.
generatedtip_passive_dianapassive_descri: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
game_announcement_ondravencashin: @PlayerAName@ (@PlayerAChamp@) just cashed in @SubA@ extra gold from that kill! League of Draaaaaven!
game_announcement_ondravendeath: @PlayerAName@ (@PlayerAChamp@) lost @SubA@G worth of Adoration stacks from that death!
generatedtip_passive_dravenpassive_descr: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
generatedtip_passive_drmundop_descriptio:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.
generatedtip_passive_ekkopassive_descrip: Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.
elise_spiderling_text_description: <keywordMajor>Spiderlings</keywordMajor> deal <magicDamage>@spell.EliseR:SpiderlingTotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and take @Effect4Amount@% reduced damage from multi-target Abilities.
generatedtip_passive_elisepassive_descri:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
generatedtip_passive_evelynnpassive_desc: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
generatedtip_passive_ezrealpassive_descr: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
generatedtip_passive_fiddlestickspassive: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.
generatedtip_passive_fiorapassive_descri: Fiora has revealed a <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor> on this Champion. If she hits the <keywordMajor>Vital</keywordMajor>, she <healing>restores Health</healing> and gains <speed>Move Speed</speed>.
generatedtip_passive_fizzpassive_descrip: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources
generatedtip_passive_galiopassive_descri: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.
generatedtip_passive_gangplankpassive_de: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
generatedtip_passive_garenpassive_descri: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.
generatedtip_passive_gnarpassive_descrip: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.
generatedtip_passive_gragaspassive_descr: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.
generatedtip_passive_gravespassive_descr: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.
generatedtip_passive_gwenp_description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.
generatedtip_passive_hecarimpassive_desc: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.
generatedtip_passive_hweipassive_descrip:
Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch.

Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.
quests_hweivsjhin_hweiinstructions: Kill <keywordMajor>Jhin</keywordMajor> with your Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Spiraling Despair</spellName>.
quests_hweivsjhin_hweiloss:
Hwei fell to Jhin's machinations, making Hwei unable to reach his full potential.

“Was I always meant to fall to Jhin? Was there any hope? I… I…”
quests_hweivsjhin_jhininstructions: Kill <keywordMajor>Hwei</keywordMajor> with your Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Curtain Call</spellName>.
quests_hweivsjhin_jhinloss:
Jhin was surpassed by Hwei's artistry, making Jhin unable to reach his full potential.

“Hwei struck beneath my mask. How… novel, how dreadful, a denouement.”
generatedtip_passive_illaoipassive_descr: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
generatedtip_passive_ireliapassive_descr: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.
generatedtip_passive_ivernp_description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience.
generatedtip_passive_jarvanivmartialcade: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.
generatedtip_passive_jaycepassive_descri: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.
quests_viktorvsjayce_jayceinstructions: Jayce must take down Viktor 5 times.
quests_viktorvsjayce_viktorinstructions: Viktor must take down Jayce 5 times.
generatedtip_passive_jinxpassivemarker_d: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.
generatedtip_passive_kaisapassive_descri: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.
generatedtip_passive_karmapassive_descri: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.
generatedtip_passive_karthusdeathdefied_: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.
generatedtip_passive_katarinapassive_des:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_kaylepassive_descri: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.
game_message_odysseykaynannouncerenabled: <font color='#42f4f1'>The Odyssey Kayn announcer is enabled!</font>
game_ping_kayn_assassin_ready: @SrcNameWithColon@<font color='#8484fb'>Shadow Assassin</font><font color='#C1FFAF'> - ready to transform!</font>
game_ping_kayn_timer_0: @SrcNameWithColon@<font color='#C1FFAF'>is early in the transformation process.</font>
generatedtip_passive_kaynpassive_descrip:
Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin.

Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions.

Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.
generatedtip_passive_kennenpassive_descr: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.
game_quest_description_khazixhunt:
The Hunt is On!Kha'Zix must kill Rengar first to become the ultimate predator. (Assists count.)

''I have grown and adapted since I took his eye. I will feast on lion!'' - Kha'Zix
generatedtip_passive_khazixpassive_descr:
Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets.

When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.
generatedtip_passive_kindredpassivemanag: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
quests_tryndamerevskindred_kindredinstru: Take down <keywordMajor>Tryndamere</keywordMajor> within 15 seconds of him activating his Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Undying Rage</spellName>, before he can take down <keywordMajor>Kindred</keywordMajor>, himself.
quests_tryndamerevskindred_tryndamereins: Take down <keywordMajor>Kindred</keywordMajor> within 15 seconds of them using their Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Lamb's Respite</spellName>, before they can do the same to <keywordMajor>Tryndamere</keywordMajor>.
generatedtip_passive_kogmawicathiandispl: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
generatedtip_passive_kogmawicathiansurpr: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
generatedtip_passive_ksantep_description:
K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.
generatedtip_passive_leblancp_descriptio: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.
generatedtip_passive_leesinpassive_descr: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.
generatedtip_passive_leonasunlightpassiv: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_lilliap_description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.
generatedtip_passive_lilliapdot_descript: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.
generatedtip_passive_lissandrapassive_de: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.
generatedtip_passive_lucianpassive_descr: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_lulupassive_descrip: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.
generatedtip_passive_luxilluminationpass: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
generatedtip_passive_malphiteshield_desc: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.
generatedtip_passive_malzaharpassive_des: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.
generatedtip_passive_maokaipassive_descr: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
generatedtip_passive_masteryipassive_des: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.
generatedtip_passive_melpassive_descript:
Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack.

When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.
generatedtip_passive_miliopassive_descri: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.
generatedtip_passive_missfortunepassive_: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.
loadouts_gear_missfortune_weapon1_locked: <titleLeft>Weapon1 is locked, it's only for pros.</titleLeft>
loadouts_gear_missfortune_weapon2: <titleLeft>Royal Arms; Capable of wiping out an entire fleet with its rapid-fire antimatter warheads, only a few of these suits were ever produced due to their immense destructive power.</titleLeft>
missfortune_skin16_weapon0description: Built by Miss Fortune from her father's blueprints, this highly-modified suit can fire a rotating barrage of bullets, antimatter tank shells, missiles, and antipersonnel flak discharges.
missfortune_skin16_weapon1description: A gravity-resistant exosuit and so-called 'black hole gun.' Fires spheres of super-condensed dark matter.
missfortune_skin16_weapon2description: Capable of wiping out an entire fleet with its rapid-fire antimatter warheads, only a few of these suits were ever produced due to their immense destructive power.
missfortune_skin16_weapon3description: A banned exosuit that utilizes creatures born from exploding suns to melt Miss Fortune's enemies.
generatedtip_passive_monkeykingpassive_d: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.
generatedtip_passive_mordekaiserpassive_: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.
tips_mordekaiser:
• Offense is your defense. Keep fighting to build up larger Indestructible shields.
  • Hitting multiple champions with the same ability can help quickly activate Darkness Rise.
  • Use Realm of Death on a low health enemy to guarantee the kill and keep their stats for the rest of a teamfight.
tips_mordekaiser_enemy:
• Mordekaiser builds up a powerful damage aura when fighting champions, so keep your distance.
  • Damage he deals can be converted into a large shield, and consumed for health
  • Realm of Death will cut you off from your teammates completely. Try to save mobility spells to escape Mordekaiser once inside
generatedtip_passive_morganapassive_desc: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.
generatedtip_passive_naafirip_descriptio: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.
game_announcement_onkilldragondynamic_en: The enemy team has slain the @desttr dragontype@!
game_announcement_onkilldragondynamic_sp: <font color='@srctr teamcolorhex@'>@srctr name@ (@srctr champion@)</font> has slain the @desttr dragontype@!
game_announcement_onkilldragondynamic_yo: @srctr name@ (@srctr champion@) has slain the @desttr dragontype@!
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_abilit: <titleLeft>Ability Haste</titleLeft><mainText>Allows you to cast your Abilities more often.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Current Ability Haste: @Total@</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft>Equivalent to reducing your Ability cooldowns by @CooldownPercentage@%.</postScriptLeft>
<titleLeft>Ability Power</titleLeft><mainText>Increases the amount of damage you deal with most Abilities.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Ability Power: @Total@ </postScriptTitle>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_armor: <titleLeft>Armor</titleLeft><mainText>Reduces the amount of <physicalDamage>physical damage</physicalDamage> you take.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Armor: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus)</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft>You take @Effect@% reduced physical damage.</postScriptLeft>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_armorp:
Lethality | Armor PenetrationIgnores an amount of your target's Armor when applying physical damage.

Lethality ignores a flat amount, Armor Penetration ignores a percentage amount.Lethality: @FlatTotal@
Armor Penetration: @PercentTotal@%
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_attack:
Attack DamageThe amount of physical damage your Attacks deal.

Also increases the amount of damage you deal with certain Abilities.Attack Damage: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus)
<titleLeft>Attack Range</titleLeft><mainText>The distance at which you can Attack.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Attack Range: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus) units</postScriptTitle>

<titleLeft>Attack Speed</titleLeft><mainText>Increases the rate at which you can Attack.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Current Attack Speed: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus)</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft>@Effect@ Attacks per second.</postScriptLeft>

Attack SpeedIncreases the rate at which you can Attack.

Ratio determines the effectiveness of bonus Attack Speed.Bonus Attack Speed: @BonusPercent@%
Attacks per second: @Effect@
Ratio: @Ratio@
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_cooldo: <titleLeft>Ability Haste</titleLeft><mainText>Allows you to cast your Abilities more often.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Ability Haste: @AbilityHasteTotal@</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft>Equivalent to reducing your Ability cooldowns by @Effect@%.</postScriptLeft>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_critic: <titleLeft>Critical Strike Chance</titleLeft><mainText>Grants a chance to deal 75% increased damage on each Attack.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Critical Strike Chance: @Total@%</postScriptTitle>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_health:
Health | Resource RegenerationThe amount of Health you regenerate over 5 seconds.

The amount of Ability resource you regenerate over 5 seconds (usually Mana or Energy).Health Regen: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus)
Resource Regen: @ResourceRegenTotal@ (@ResourceRegenBase@ base + @ResourceRegenBonus@ bonus)
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_lifest: <titleLeft>Life Steal</titleLeft><mainText>Returns a portion of the damage you deal with Attacks as <scaleHealth>Health</scaleHealth>.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Life Steal: @Total@%</postScriptTitle>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_magicp:
Magic PenetrationIgnores an amount of your target's Magic Resist when applying magic damage.Flat Magic Penetration: @FlatTotal@
Magic Penetration: @PercentTotal@%
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_magicr: <titleLeft>Magic Resist</titleLeft><mainText>Reduces the amount of <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> you take.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Magic Resist: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus)</postScriptTitle><postScriptLeft> You take @Effect@% reduced magic damage.</postScriptLeft>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_moveme: <titleLeft>Move Speed</titleLeft><mainText>The speed at which you travel.</mainText><postScriptTitle>Move Speed: @Total@ (@Base@ base + @Bonus@ bonus) units per second</postScriptTitle>
game_dynamicmenutext_[attributes]_tenaci:
TenacityReduces the duration of crowd control debuffs, such as Slows and Stuns.

Does not affect Airborne or Suppression.Tenacity: @Total@%
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_dominio: <titleLeft>Enhanced Recall</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF9900'>Click to Use</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 4.5 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.</mainText>
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_pointst: <titleLeft>Level Up</titleLeft><subtitleLeft>You have Unspent Ability Points</subtitleLeft><mainText>Click on any of the level up tabs above to increase the Ability's power.</mainText>
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_showdow: <titleLeft>Recall (Showdown)</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF9900'>Click to Use</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 6 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.</mainText>
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_siegete: <titleLeft>Recall</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF9900'>Click to Use</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 4 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.</mainText>
game_dynamicmenutext_[playerhud]_telepor: <titleLeft>Recall</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF9900'>Click to Use</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 8 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.</mainText>

<titleLeft>Recall</titleLeft><titleRight>[B]</titleRight><subtitleLeft><font color='#FF0000'>Recall is disabled on this mode.</font></subtitleLeft><mainText>But you can still express yourself baby.</mainText>
generatedtip_passive_namipassive_descrip: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.
generatedtip_passive_nasuspassive_descri: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
quests_nasusvsrenekton_nasusinstructions: Kill Renekton while Nasus' Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Fury of the Sands</spellName> is active.
quests_nasusvsrenekton_renektoninstructi: Kill Nasus while Renekton's Ultimate Ability, <spellName>Dominus</spellName>, is active.
generatedtip_passive_nautiluspassive_des: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.
generatedtip_passive_neekopassive_descri: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.
generatedtip_passive_nilahpassive_descri: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.
generatedtip_passive_nocturnep_descripti:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.
generatedtip_passive_nunupassive_descrip: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.
generatedtip_passive_olafberzerkerrage_d: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.
generatedtip_passive_oriannap_descriptio: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.
generatedtip_passive_ornnp_description:
Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.
generatedtip_passive_pantheonpassive_des: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.
generatedtip_passive_poppypassive_descri: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.
generatedtip_passive_qiyanapassive_descr: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.
generatedtip_passive_quinnpassive_descri: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.
generatedtip_passive_rammusp_description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.
generatedtip_passive_reksaipassive_descr: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.
generatedtip_passive_rellp_description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.
generatedtip_passive_renatapassive_descr: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.
generatedtip_passive_renektonpredator_de: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.
game_quest_description_rengarhunt:
The Hunt is On!Rengar must kill Kha'Zix first to become the ultimate hunter. (Assists count.)

''This twisted monster has evaded me for too long. I will have his head!'' - Rengar
generatedtip_passive_rengarpassive_descr:
While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.
generatedtip_passive_rivenpassive_descri: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.
generatedtip_passive_rumbleheatsystem_de: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
generatedtip_passive_samirapassive_descr: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.
generatedtip_passive_sejuanipassive_desc: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_sennapassive_descri:
When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance.

Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.
character_seraphine_lore: Born in Piltover to Zaunite parents, Seraphine can hear the souls of others—the world sings to her, and she sings back. Though these sounds overwhelmed her in her youth, she now draws on them for inspiration, turning the chaos into a symphony. She performs for the sister cities to remind their citizens that they're not alone, that they're stronger together, and that, in her eyes, their potential is limitless.
generatedtip_passive_seraphinepassive_de: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.
generatedtip_passive_settpassive_descrip: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.
standalone_settings_general_accountinfo: You are signed in using a 3rd party account. Upgrade your account to access the entire library of Riot Games on PC & Mobile.
standalone_settings_general_deletewarnin: Are you sure you want to begin the process to delete your account? This is permanent and will delete your account across all games.
generatedtip_passive_shacopassive_descri: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.
generatedtip_passive_shenpassive_descrip: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
quests_shenvszed_sheninstructions: Damage and earn a takedown on Zed before he kills @spell.ZedPassive:ShenZedQuestKillCount@ nearby allies.
quests_shenvszed_zedinstructions: Kill @spell.ZedPassive:ShenZedQuestKillCount@ enemy champions near Shen while avoiding getting taken down by him.
generatedtip_passive_shyvanapassive_desc: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
generatedtip_passive_shyvanapassiveha_de: Shyvana gains permanent stacking Armor and Magic Resistance whenever she or her allies kill siege minions or super minions. She also gains a stack whenever a Health Relic AOE heals her on the enemy mapside.
generatedtip_passive_shyvanapassivenb_de: Shyvana gains permanent stacking Armor and Magic Resistance whenever she or her allies kill nearby epic monsters, buff monsters, and scuttlecrabs.
generatedtip_passive_singedp_description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.
game_messagebox_caption_replay_version_m: Replay version does not match game version
game_messagebox_text_replay_version_mism: This replay was created by an older version of League of Legends (%s). You are running version %s. These versions are incompatible. The game will now exit.
generatedtip_passive_sionpassive_descrip: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.
jungle_focus_precision_description:
Passive - Gain Jungle Focus Precision
Your basic attacks deal 7 bonus magic damage against monsters.
vanguard_dialog_nosession: You need to have Vanguard running to play.
generatedtip_passive_sivirpassive_descri: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
generatedtip_passive_skarnerpassive_desc: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.
generatedtip_passive_smolderp_descriptio: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with {{Spell_SmolderQ_Name}} grants a stack of {{Spell_SmolderP_Name}}. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.
generatedtip_passive_sonapassive_descrip:
Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.

Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.
passive_swain_pingoverride: @SrcNameWithColon@Ravenous Flock <font color='#C1FFAF'>- </font><font color='#FF3F3F'>@SubA@ Stacks, @SubB@ Bonus Health</font>
generatedtip_passive_sylaspassive_descri: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.
generatedtip_passive_syndrapassive_descr:
Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.

Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional charge
Force of Will: Bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targets
Unleashed Power: Executes low health targets
generatedtip_passive_tahmkenchpassive_de: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of <spellName>An Acquired Taste</spellName>. At three stacks, he can use <spellName>Devour</spellName> on an enemy champion.
generatedtip_passive_taliyahpassive_desc: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.
generatedtip_passive_talonpassive_descri: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
generatedtip_passive_taricpassive_descri: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
game_map_mode_description_11_doombotstee: Battle with friends against the Doom Bots of Doom and their evil overlord in this fast survival style game mode.
generatedtip_passive_teemopassive_descri: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

game_message_threshannouncerenabled: <font color='#42f4f1'>The Dark Star Thresh announcer is enabled!</font>
generatedtip_passive_threshpassivesouls_: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
generatedtip_passive_tristanapassive_des: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
generatedtip_passive_trundlediseaseovers: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
generatedtip_passive_twitchdeadlyvenomma: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
generatedtip_passive_udyrpassive_descrip: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.
generatedtip_passive_urgotpassive_descri: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
generatedtip_passive_varuspassive_descri: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
generatedtip_passive_vaynepassive_descri: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
generatedtip_passive_veigarpassive_descr: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
passive_veigar_pingoverride: @SrcNameWithColon@Phenomenal Evil Power<font color='#C1FFAF'> - </font><font color='#5555FF'>@SubA@ Ability Power</font>
generatedtip_passive_velkozpassive_descr: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
generatedtip_passive_vexp_description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.
game_error_dx11_device_removed: Windows has restarted your GPU driver due to a problem, driver upgrade or physical removal. League of Legends will terminate.
game_ping_[throttled]_individualpingthro: You must wait before issuing more pings of that type.
generatedtip_passive_viegopassive_descri: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.
generatedtip_passive_viktorpassive_descr: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.
generatedtip_passive_vipassive_descripti: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
options_video_antialiasing_description: Improves visual quality by reducing jaggedness. This may lower performance.
options_video_frameratecap_description: Uncapping framerate may increase perceived smoothness of the game on higher end machines.
options_video_mapskindisablearcade_descr: Disabled Arcade themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablelunarrevel_d: Disabled Lunar Revel themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablemsi_descript: Disabled MSI themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisableodyssey_desc: Disabled Odyssey themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablepoolparty_de: Disabled Pool Party themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablepopstar_desc: Disabled Pop Star themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisableproject_desc: Disabled Project themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablesnowdown_des: Disabled Snowdown themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisablestarguardian: Disabled Star Guardian themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisableurf_descript: Disabled URF themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_mapskindisableworlds_descr: Disabled Worlds themed map objects and visual effects.
options_video_userelativeteamcolors_desc: Regardless of your starting side, all allied minions and structures are blue and all enemy units are red.
options_video_waitforvsync_description: Increases image stability at the cost of performance.
options_video_waitforvsyncosx: Wait for Vertical Sync (disables Software Mouse handling)
ping_victory_pin: We won the Feats of Strength!
ping_victory_pin_unclaimed: No one has won the feat battle...
player_behavior_cheating_desc: Scripting, botting, using unapproved third-party program
player_behavior_intentional_feeding_desc: Disrupting the game by purposefully giving the enemy team an advantage. Intentional feeding is not having a bad game or playing off-meta.
player_behavior_leaving_the_game_desc: Being idle for long periods, refusing to participate in productive gameplay, or leaving the game before its conclusion.
player_behavior_mute:
Open Mute Menu
(Hold To Mute Player)
player_behavior_mute_emotes_inactive: Enemy emotes are turned off in the options menu
player_behavior_negative_attitude_desc: Griefing, giving up, putting other players down or excessively expressing negative attitudes about the game.
player_behavior_offensive_name_desc: Having a name that makes other players feel uncomfortable or unwelcome.
player_behavior_report_submitted: Your report for @SummonerName@(@ChampName@) has been saved and will be submitted at the end of the game. You can update your report at any point during the game.
player_behavior_report_updated: Your report for @SummonerName@(@ChampName@) has been updated.
player_behavior_select_categories: Select all that apply. You may update your report later.
player_behavior_verbal_abuse_desc: Communicating in a way that impacts other players negatively through verbal harassment, threats, hate speech, or offensive language.
reminder_invisibility: <keywordStealth>Invisible</keywordStealth> units cannot be revealed except by turrets or <font color='#ee91d7'>True Sight</font color>.
replayui_help_visibilitybody:
Scoreboard [Tab]
Free up the middle of the screen.

Hide All [H]
Hide all interface elements.

Team Fight [A]
Minimal interface for watching team fights.

Visibility Menu
Show or hide specific interface elements.
standalone_errors_patching_unsupportedde: Your device is not capable of playing TFT. The game works best on an iPhone 6S or newer.
standalone_errors_service_error_message:
A service error has occured. Unable to complete action.

Error code: %s
ui_combatoverview_cc_hover_text:
Total time you Crowd Controlled the enemy team.
Total time you were Crowd Controlled.
generatedtip_passive_vladimirbloodgorged: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
generatedtip_passive_volibearp_descripti: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
generatedtip_passive_warwickp_descriptio: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
generatedtip_passive_xayahpassive_descri: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.
generatedtip_passive_xerathascended2_des: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.
generatedtip_passive_xinzhaop_descriptio: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
generatedtip_passive_yasuopassive_descri: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
generatedtip_passive_yonepassive_descrip: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.
generatedtip_passive_yorickpassive_descr: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.
generatedtip_passive_yunarapassive_descr: Yunara's Critical Strikes deal bonus magic damage.
generatedtip_passive_yuumip_description:
Periodically, when Yuumi strikes a champion with an attack or ability, she restores health to herself and the next ally she Attaches to.

While Attached, Yuumi generates a special bond with her allies. The ally with the strongest bond enhances Yuumi's abilities while she is Attached to them.
generatedtip_passive_zedpassive_descript: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.
generatedtip_passive_zeripassive_descrip: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.
generatedtip_passive_zyrap_description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.
